text: In 1950 he began to take photographs not only in Germany but also in Africa and. America. An exhibition of these works which is now on view in a Berlin gallery is. most impressive. As Friedrich Du'rrenmatt, the Swiss playwright and author, wrote. Wicki's blacks and greys are not only the colours of the lost and the forgotten, but. they are also the technical means of abstraction..

name: Friedrich Du'rrenmatt
